title: Sony WF-1000XM4 review: silence to my ears
description: Sonys new WF-1000XM4 wireless earbuds have powerful noise cancellation that rivals over-ear headphones. They offer fantastic sound quality with support for the LDAC codec and beat competitors like the AirPods Pro and Bose QuietComfort Earbuds in battery life. Are these the new noise-canceling buds to get?
